concept.title: For Businesses
concept.shortdesc: Those who own or work at various businesses have certain classroom needs that Airclassroom can fulfill!

conbody.p:
Businesswoman Mid-Presentation
In today's gig economy, businesses are on the look out for more transportable ways to engage in their day-to-day activities. Long-term office space is a difficult item to acquire; temporary rentals for businesses is the way of the 21st Century.

At Airclassroom, we provide state-of-the-art classrooms for community business leaders. Our classrooms come with iMacs, iPads, projectors, and Cuisnart ICE-60W Ice Cream and Gelato Machines. Whether your organization needs a place to develop and practice a business presentation, or a location to collaborate on a new piece of technology, Airclassroom will be there to rent a temporary workspace for you.
